ygData.subject: RE: Mask of Deception
ygData.msgSnippet: I believe that the DE illusion gives you the base faction for Dark Elves but this faction is then modified by your choice of deity and any other faction
ygData.messageBody:
I believe that the DE illusion gives you the base faction for Dark Elves but
this faction is then modified by your choice of deity and any other faction
adjustments you may have accrued (or not accrued as the case may be) as your
normal self.

I have heard that some people can enter the Ogre city with it unless they
have been killing bouncers, but most people cannot enter Neriak because the
adjusted base faction is just not good enough for them to like you.

Has anyone raised their faction enough to actually enter Neriak unmolested?

-Faras

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Kirk Baptista [mailto:dopey@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, February 02, 2000 2:18 AM
> To: ''eqbards@onelist.com' '
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] Mask of Deception
>
>
> From: Kirk Baptista <dopey@...>
>
> I have noticed that the Dark Elf illusion does not have any effect on
> faction, is this correct?
>
> I though the whole reason for it was so that people would
> think you're a
> dark elf, and treat you accordingly. But, I seem to still be KOS in
> Nektulos, etc. and he dark elf merchies in South Ro still
> won't sell to me.
>
> So it seems to me that the illusion is pretty much just a
> toy, with no real
> value. Good thing it has good stat boosts otherwise.
>
> Am I missing something?
>
> Aranlas Starchaser
> Lone Elf of Kelethin
>
